title: Line Strike Emergency Response
description: A third-party construction crew has struck a natural gas distribution line. The system must manage the immediate response.

tasks.description: Receive the emergency call and confirm the location of the line strike.
tasks.expected_outcome: System logs the critical incident and its location.

tasks.description: Immediately dispatch an emergency gas crew and notify the local fire department.
tasks.expected_outcome: System dispatches a crew and sends an automated notification to first responders.

tasks.description: Identify the valves that need to be closed to isolate the damaged section of pipe.
tasks.expected_outcome: System displays the required valve locations on a map for the responding crew.
